attributes.additional_details:
To allow those who have already taken an Annuity, to be able to go back to there pension provider and take advantage of the proposed pension changes.
There could be a time frame on this, say if you have taken an annuity in the last 5 years, you would be able to use the proposed changes retrospectively.
This would enable you to have full access to your pension pot, less any monies already paid plus a set fee paid to the provider.
